name: Relay
description: Relay is an NFT of the drawing gifted by Glenn Kaino and Tommie Smith to President Barack Obama in the Oval Office, starting a conversation about human rights as an intergenerational and intersectional relay that inspired the Pass the Baton movement. Based on an image from Tommie Smithâ€™s vast collection of images of his victories, the drawing depicts Tommie passing the baton to a fourth runner in world-record time.
